summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3739 for the improvement of Lakeside Avenue South, from Irving Street to the south line of Burke's 2nd Addition, thence south to a connection with Frink Boulevard, by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45887, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
